attributes.action: Give the public a choice regarding methods of money transactions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent fiasco concerning lost data at government offices, surely we should be allowed to chose our method of payment, we were assured when post office closures began that by being paid directly into our bank that we would have added security....how wrong this was, STOP P.O. CLOSURES AND LET US DECIDE FOR OURSELVES

rejection.details: What is it you wish the Government to do?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
